headings.usage: Use for all section titles, hero text, and product names. Tight tracking (-0.02em) for large text.

body.usage: Use for descriptions, pricing, and UI elements. High legibility.

visual_enhancers.tracing_beam: Animated gradient border using mask-image or framer-motion

buttons.primary: bg-primary text-primary-foreground hover:bg-primary/90 shadow-[0_0_15px_rgba(124,58,237,0.4)] transition-all duration-300 rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-bold tracking-wide
buttons.secondary: bg-transparent border border-white/20 hover:bg-white/10 text-white rounded-full px-8 py-6 font-medium backdrop-blur-sm

cards.product: group relative overflow-hidden rounded-2xl bg-card border border-white/5 hover:border-primary/50 transition-colors duration-500
cards.pricing: relative p-8 rounded-3xl bg-card/50 border border-white/10 hover:bg-card/80 transition-all duration-300

inputs.default: bg-black/50 border-white/10 focus:border-primary/50 focus:ring-primary/20 rounded-xl h-12 px-4

hero_section.structure: Full-screen height (min-h-[90vh]), centered content with massive typography (text-6xl to text-8xl). Background image with heavy dark overlay + radial gradient glow.

product_catalog.card_style: Minimalist dark cards with large cover art, price tag in neon accent, and 'Buy Now' button hidden until hover.

pricing_table.highlight: Center 'Best Value' card with 'Tracing Beam' border effect and slightly elevated scale.
pricing_table.features: Checkmarks in bright green (secondary color), cross marks in muted gray.

assets.icons: Use Lucide React (default). For brand icons, use simple SVGs or the provided images.

instructions_to_main_agent: 1. INSTALL FONTS: Add '@fontsource/unbounded' and '@fontsource/manrope' to package.json immediately.
2. SETUP THEME: Overwrite 'tailwind.config.js' with the colors defined in this JSON. Ensure 'darkMode' is set to 'class'.
3. CLEANUP: Remove all default styles in 'App.css' and 'index.css'. Replace with a clean reset that applies the dark background globally.
4. COMPONENT OVERRIDES: When using Shadcn components (like Card or Button), use the 'className' prop to inject the custom styles defined here. Do not rely on default Shadcn styles.
5. IMAGES: Use the provided Unsplash URLs for the catalog. Do not leave empty image slots.
6. TESTING: Add 'data-testid' to all interactive elements (buttons, inputs, product cards).
7. LAYOUT: Use 'grid-cols-1' for mobile and expand to 'grid-cols-4' for desktop. Always check responsiveness.
8. CRITICAL: Ensure the 'Mercado Pago' checkout flow is simulated or mocked if no API key is present, but the UI must look real.
universal_guidelines: Avoid gradients on text unless it's a very large heading.
Never use pure black (#000000) for cards; use #0a0a0a or #121212.
Always add a subtle border (border-white/5) to dark cards to separate them from the background.
Input fields should have a height of at least 48px (h-12) for better touch targets.
